NewsArticle.Title: Reset Notes
NewsArticle.Content: Reset Notes for March 17, 2015 Arcella's Gift * Increased the chance of receiving the "Hardened Crystal Orb Ring" Arcella's Stolen Bag * Increased the chance of receiving "Arcella's Stolen Bag" from boss drop * Arcella's Stolen Bag can now be OPENED or RETURNED back to Arcella * Arcella's Stolen Bag will give you the option to receive - Experience Points from 200-400 Million - Ability Points from 1.5-5 Million - 3 Day wait period upon opening We appreciate all the recent suggestions given to us! Dark Ages Team
